mdx.excerpt: Joining Hines In May 2021, I joined the application development team at Hines —one of the largest privately held real estate investors and managers in the world…

frontmatter.title: Innovating the global real estate investment industry with tech
frontmatter.description: Our developments are crucial for the workflow of managing the company's $80 Billion in assets under management.

frontmatter.title: How to create a COVID dashboard web application with Python
frontmatter.description: Our application gained over 10k visits and received code contributions from open-source developers around the world.

frontmatter.title: Day in the Life of a Software Engineer | Texas Edition
frontmatter.description: Finally did it. This is a typical day in my life as a software developer as we have returned to the office. Of course, not all the days are the same but for the most part, it's fairly accurate!
